column1: Has the founder earned an advanced degree from a respected institution?
Has the founder held a leadership role in a technology company?
Did the founder co-found the company with a small team?
Has the founder previously worked at a startup?
Has the founder's previous startup experience included any acquisitions?
Does the founder have experience in a technical field?
Has the founder served in a C-level role at a public company?
Is the founder based in California?
Has the founder held board or advisor roles at large companies?
Does the founder have a background in finance or investment?
